arts.ttl: Scotland specialise in twisted irony and a warped sense of humour is needed upon proof we belong – Keith Jackson in Warsaw
arts.sum: It couldn’t have been any more Scottish had it swaggered off into the night wearing a kilt and eating a black pudding supper.

arts.ttl: Clarke & Scotland find way to bounce back yet again
arts.sum: Not for the first time, Steve Clarke and his Scotland side have responded to adversity with crucial results.

arts.ttl: 'I'll wind McCoist up' - McGinn on reaching 20 Scotland goals
arts.sum: Midfielder John McGinn discusses scoring his 20th goal for Scotland to put him fifth in the all-time list, ahead of Ally McCoist.

arts.ttl: 'Late win is what Scotland performance deserved'
arts.sum: Scotland captain Andy Robertson says his side deserved their late win in Poland, which ensured they avoid automatic Nations League relegation.

arts.ttl: Scotland 'must evolve all the time' to be successful
arts.sum: Head coach Steve Clarke says his side must continue to develop after they ended their Nations League campaign with a win in Poland.

arts.ttl: Billie Jean King Cup: Italy defeat Poland to reach final
arts.sum: World number four Paolini and her team-mate Sara Errani clinched the deciding doubles 7-5 7-5 against Swiatek and Katarzyna Kawa after an extraordinary second-set comeback in Malaga. Jasmine Paolini's Italy reached their second successive Billie Jean King Cup final with a 2-1 victory over Poland, who had been given a glimmer of hope by five-time Grand Slam champion Iga Swiatek.

arts.ttl: Steve Clarke hails Scotland’s spirit after earning Nations League play-off
arts.sum: Andy Robertson headed home John Souttar’s cross three minutes into added time to secure a 2-1 win over Poland.

arts.ttl: Steve Clarke unaware of Scotland's Nations League near miss as he makes admission over Ben Doak substitution
arts.sum: John McGinn and Andy Robertson were on target in a dramatic vctory as Scotland ended their Nations League campaign on a high with victory over Poland in Warsaw

arts.ttl: 'Scotland can look forward to World Cup qualifying now'
arts.sum: Kenny Macintyre and the team review Poland 1-2 Scotland in the Nations League

arts.ttl: Scotland's Nations League playoff opponents revealed as crucial World Cup seeding hinges on two results
arts.sum: The Scots left it late to leapfrog the hosts and avoid immediate relegation from the top tier of the Nations League
